entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vegreville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vegreville 10:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
